headline: SPECTRUM AWARDS $300,000 TO FIFTH CLASS OF SPECTRUM SCHOLARS
summary: Spectrum today introduced the fifth class of Spectrum Scholars, a group of 15 rising college juniors who each will receive a $20,000 scholarship and participate in a two-year professional development program. With this commitment, the annual Spectrum Scholars program has awarded $1.8 million in financial assistance, supporting the early professional development of 90 students since launching in 2020.

headline: Zacks Industry Outlook Highlights Comcast, Charter Communications and Naspers
summary: Comcast, Charter and Naspers adapt to cord-cutting headwinds with broadband growth, M&A moves and digital strategy pivots.
